attributes.action: when you hit a cat on the road or anywhere, you have to report it.
attributes.additional_details: I have lost two cats to the road now, i live next to jcb headquarters with the workers coming out and using the back lanes to get out quicker. This has led to 2 of my pets and multiple people i know to have lost their animals.It needs to stop, and it needs to be a legal issue that you have to inform a vet.
attributes.background: When you hit a cat you have to report it to a local vet.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your loss.

We have already published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require drivers who hit a cat to take them to a veterinarian: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649316
